comments.author: Moderator.1056
comments.body:
Hi everyone,

Just as smiley says, this topic already exists in another thread: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/WvW-objective-names
In order to gather a proper feedback, please share your thoughts there.

And so, we proceed to close this thread.
Thank you for your understanding.

comments.author: zerorogue.9410
comments.body:
I’ve been tinkering with a program that will use the GW2 API, So far everything is great and I cant wait to put this stuff in action.

I do have one suggestion. In the WvW Objective Names all the names print out as
Tower, Tower, Keep, Fishing Village, Green Mill, etc…

Instead could it print out the proper names for them?
Anzalias Pass ,Danelon Passage,Darkrait Inlet,Durios Gulch ,Golanta Clearing ,Jerrifer’s Slough, etc…
